amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert the President's budget proposal as scored by CBO.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-423 to strike the text of the bill and insert President Obama's budget proposal as scored by CBO.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Mulvaney.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 0 - 414 (Roll no. 143).
